episodes.title: Bhakti Marga of Vishwananda - 8 Cult Warning Signs
episodes.description:
#SwamiVishwananda #ParamahamsaVishwananda #BhaktiMarga #CultAwareness #RobertJLifton #robertlifton 

- Information about Bhakti Marga: 
- ' Just Love' Podcasts by German TV station ARD: ➡️  https://www.hessenschau.de/podcasts/just-love/index.html 
- English transcript: ➡️ https://web.archive.org/web/20241226152438/https://0bin.net/paste/XUJrqPiD#qOroMIThqU5xdSGCUHEYU9eWK733qPpkCAjtPO0lbhL

======

Further reading about cult dynamics, brainwashing, and deprogramming:

- Hot to leave a cult ➡️ https://www.wikihow.com/Leave-a-Cult
- BITE Model by Steven Hassan: ➡️ https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model-pdf-download/
- 10 cult warning signs by Rick Ross: ➡️ https://culteducation.com/warningsigns.html

=====

Books :
-  Robert Jay Lifton: Thought Reform and the Psychology of Totalism: A Study of Brainwashing in China ➡️ https://a.co/d/0BG1zoI
-  Robert Jay Lifton: Destroying the World to Save It: Aum Shinrikyo, Apocalyptic Violence, and the New Global Terrorism ➡️ https://a.co/d/etbKUwT
- Steven Hassan, Combating Cult Mind Control: The Guide to Protection, Rescue and Recovery from Destructive Cults, ➡️ https://a.co/d/j5RQ8HN
- Rick Alan Ross, Cults Inside Out: How People Get In and Can Get Out, ➡️ https://a.co/d/0ThlOHM
